org.apache.ignite.ml.tree.data

Class TreeDataIndex

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.ml.tree.data.TreeDataIndex

  • public class TreeDataIndex
extends Object
    Index for representing sorted dataset rows for each features. It may be reused while decision tree learning at several levels through filter method.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors
